Languages

❖ C,

❖ C++,

❖ Java,

❖ Python.

Rules

❖ Two teams can represent from a college.

❖ Each team should be comprised of two members.

❖ Should maintain silence inside the lab.

❖ Languages C,C++,Java and Python.

❖ Cheating will not be tolerated at any means.

❖ Using mobile phones inside the lab is prohibited.

❖ Disturbing other team members will lead to disqualification.

❖ Arguing with the judges or the event coordinators will lead to disqualification.

Round 1


Rules

❖ Prelims will be conducted. ( Questions will come from C,C++,Java and Python)

❖ Total time allocated for this round will be 1 Hour.

❖ You have to compulsorily attend 40 questions out of 50 questions.

Round 2


Rules

❖ The second round will be the coding round for which you have to develop a solution for a given problem ….. which can be in either C,C++,Java or Python. (The solution you provide should be the optimal solution...marks won’t be given to comprised solution).

❖ Total time allocated for this round will be 1 Hour 30 minutes.



Our Vision

Bishop Heber College, A great Institution of higher education set in beautiful surroundings, seeks to function through mutual love and respect and with efficiency and creativity, catering to the educational needs of all, especially the poor, the needy and the under-privileged, inspired by the love of our Lord Jesus Christ.
